text: Mathura Prasad Mishra is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha, the lower house of the Parliament of India from Begusarai, Bihar as a member of the Indian National Congress. ==References== ==External links== *Official biographical sketch on the Parliament of India website Category:1918 births Category:Possibly living people Category:1st Lok Sabha members Category:2nd Lok Sabha members Category:3rd Lok Sabha members Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Lok Sabha members from Bihar
title: Mathura Prasad Mishra
